meta.title: Capabilities
meta.description: ISO 17025 accredited analytical outcomes including purity, label claim verification, and full stability lifecycle management.

technicalSpecs.title: Analytical Chemistry
technicalSpecs.subtitle: Identity & Potency
technicalSpecs.description: Quantitative and qualitative analysis utilizing compendial methods to ensure raw materials and final products meet strict specifications.

tests.name: Potency & Label Claim
tests.application: Verification of vitamins, amino acids, and active markers.
tests.deepDive: We specialize in multi-component assays within complex matrices. Our UPLC workflows provide superior peak resolution and shorter run times, ensuring accurate quantification of label claims even in products with high botanical interference.

tests.name: Heavy Metals (USP <2232>)
tests.application: Trace level detection of Pb, As, Cd, and Hg.
tests.deepDive: Utilizing collision cell technology, we eliminate polyatomic interferences to provide sub-ppb detection limits. This is critical for clients meeting Prop 65 or stringent heavy metal limits in botanical supplements.

tests.name: Residual Solvents (<467>)
tests.application: Screening for Class 1, 2, and 3 manufacturing solvents.
tests.deepDive: Our headspace GC-MS protocols identify volatile organic impurities that may remain from the extraction or manufacturing process, ensuring compliance with USP <467> and ICH Q3C guidelines.

technicalSpecs.title: Microbiology Programs
technicalSpecs.subtitle: Safety & Hygiene
technicalSpecs.description: Risk-based microbiology testing designed to protect consumer health and validate the hygiene of your manufacturing environment.

tests.name: Microbial Enumeration
tests.application: Total Aerobic Microbial Count (TAMC) and TYMC.
tests.deepDive: Beyond simple counts, we perform suitability testing to ensure your product's inherent properties don't inhibit the growth of the microbes we are trying to detect, providing a truly accurate safety profile.

tests.name: Pathogen Screening
tests.application: Absence testing for S. aureus, Salmonella, and E. coli.
tests.deepDive: We utilize enrichment protocols to detect low-level pathogens. Our workflows are designed for zero cross-contamination, providing the "Absence-In" certification required for batch release.

tests.name: Preservative Efficacy
tests.deepDive: Essential for cosmetics and liquid supplements. We inoculate your product with five specific microorganisms and monitor the "kill rate" over 28 days to validate your preservative system's effectiveness.

technicalSpecs.title: Stability Testing
technicalSpecs.subtitle: Shelf-Life Management
technicalSpecs.description: Comprehensive lifecycle management to establish and defend product expiration dates under various climatic conditions.

tests.name: Accelerated Storage
tests.application: Rapid degradation assessment for early shelf-life estimates.
tests.deepDive: By stressing the product under high heat and humidity, we can predict 24 months of shelf stability in just 6 months. This allows for faster market entry while real-time studies continue.

tests.name: ICH Climatic Zones I-IV
tests.application: Standard and Tropical stability storage conditions.
tests.deepDive: Our walk-in and reach-in chambers are validated for ICH Zones I-IV. Whether your product is destined for temperate North America or tropical Southeast Asia, we have the validated environment to test it.

tests.name: Photostability (Q1B)
tests.application: Stress testing against UV and visible light exposure.
tests.deepDive: We determine if your packaging provides sufficient protection. Samples are exposed to a minimum of 1.2 million lux hours to identify light-sensitive degradation pathways.

technicalSpecs.title: Method Development
technicalSpecs.subtitle: Custom Analytical Solutions
technicalSpecs.description: Translating complex analytical challenges into robust, validated, and transfer-ready standard operating procedures.

tests.name: Formal Validation
tests.application: Full validation of Accuracy, Precision, and Linearity.
tests.deepDive: When a compendial method doesn't exist for your unique formulation, we build one. Our validation packages are "Audit-Ready," including all raw data and statistical analysis required for regulatory filing.

tests.name: Cleaning Validation
tests.application: Ensuring zero carryover in manufacturing equipment.
tests.deepDive: We develop ultra-sensitive methods to detect trace levels of actives or detergents, helping manufacturing teams validate their "Clean-in-Place" (CIP) protocols.

tests.name: Extractables & Leachables
tests.deepDive: We investigate the interaction between your product and its container. This is vital for liquid formulations and long-term stability projects where packaging integrity is a variable.

cta.description: Share your matrix details and regulatory requirements. Our technical team will return a scoped plan and quote within 24 business hours.
